content: Hi folks, I'd just like to remind you that today is the last chance to sign up for and make the payment for conference dinner. I see there's about 20 people who expressed interested but still haven't paid - so please if you can find me in the next coffee break or two that'd be great :)
P.S. Something came up for me this coffee break, so you can talk to Ieva about payment. I'll be back in ~45 mintues, so you can find me then or at the last coffee break.
